front.title: Silence Is Golden (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your droids are destiny +1. Once per turn, if you just drew a non-[Presence] droid for destiny, may take that droid into hand. Once per turn, may deploy Droid Workshop, Forced Servitude, Incinerator, or Wuher from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
